name: Dragged & Dropboxed
description:
This is a collaborative project where a bunch of people build things together on the same dropbox folder. We use Game Maker Studio 2, and we have fun creating our own little world with a bunch of things in it that interact with one another.

Each creator has their own set of rooms where they can test things out, that we call **a lair**. The current list of Creator includes:

  • Adrien
  • Ohlala
  • Dawn
  • Rafa

If you wish to take part in this, join our discord server! https://discord.gg/ggqZ2c4
